I see nothing whatsoever saying this can be used online. And that is good. It cannot. If you try, you will get your IP address banned by GameSpy for using a cracked executable.

Buy it if you must play multiplayer. Otherwise you will lose more than you suspect.
actually the multiplayer is working fine in this release, and the krew have played threw it twice now.
